Turing Award 2020

Winners: Jeffrey Ullman, Alfred Aho

Books in algorithms and compilers

The ACM declared Aho and Ullman receivers of the A.M. Award in 2020. They have been granted such award because of their books in compilers and algorithms and their lasting knowledge have an impact on on the sector via the textbooks they wrote collectively, which formed generations of students. it thaught that C, must be translated to a decrement the amount of stage languages that machines understand. such lack of knowledge is what made them win the award.

In memory of A.M. Turing
